short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will close duplicate tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is supposed to close duplicate and multiple tabs (containing identical urls).
There is a manual mode (via button) and an automatic mode where newly opened tabs are being tracked. When a new tab has old equivalent tabs (with identical urls) the older ones are closed. There is an exclude and include list for domains to adjust closing behaviour.
